languages.text: "Цвета техножреца запятнаны грязью. Размыты. Закрашены гнилью... Но ярко-алый еще тлеет глубоко в его сердце. Угасающее пламя... можно разжечь вновь".
"The Tech-Priest's colours are stained with grime. They are diluted. Painted over with rot... And yet his heart still holds a cinder of bright red. This dying flame... can be ignited anew."
languages.original_text: "Цвета техножреца запятнаны грязью. Размыты. Закрашены гнилью... Но ярко-алый еще тлеет глубоко в его сердце. Угасающее пламя... можно разжечь вновь".

traits.locale_text: "The Tech-Priest's colours are stained with grime. They are diluted. Painted over with rot... And yet his heart still holds a cinder of bright red. This dying flame... can be ignited anew."

"The Tech-Priest's colours are stained with grime. They are diluted. Painted over with rot... And yet his heart still holds a cinder of bright red. This dying flame... can be ignited anew."

languages.text: "Die Farben des Techpriesters sind mit Schmutz befleckt. Sie wurden verdünnt. Mit Fäule übermalt ... Und dennoch enthält sein Herz immer noch strahlend rote Glut. Diese sterbende Flamme ... kann neu entzündet werden."
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest's colours are stained with grime. They are diluted. Painted over with rot... And yet his heart still holds a cinder of bright red. This dying flame... can be ignited anew."

traits.locale_text: "Die Farben des Techpriesters sind mit Schmutz befleckt. Sie wurden verdünnt. Mit Fäule übermalt ... Und dennoch enthält sein Herz immer noch strahlend rote Glut. Diese sterbende Flamme ... kann neu entzündet werden."

languages.text: « Les couleurs du technoprêtre sont entachées de crasse. Elles sont diluées, recouvertes de moisissure... Pourtant, son cœur garde quelques braises d'un rouge ardent. Cette flamme mourante... pourrait être ravivée. »
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest's colours are stained with grime. They are diluted. Painted over with rot... And yet his heart still holds a cinder of bright red. This dying flame... can be ignited anew."

traits.locale_text: « Les couleurs du technoprêtre sont entachées de crasse. Elles sont diluées, recouvertes de moisissure... Pourtant, son cœur garde quelques braises d'un rouge ardent. Cette flamme mourante... pourrait être ravivée. »

languages.text: “这位技术神甫的颜色已经被污浊玷污。那些颜色被稀释，涂满了腐朽……可他心中仍有一团鲜红的火焰。这团即将熄灭的火焰……可以再次熊熊燃烧。”
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest's colours are stained with grime. They are diluted. Painted over with rot... And yet his heart still holds a cinder of bright red. This dying flame... can be ignited anew."

traits.locale_text: “这位技术祭司的颜色已经被污浊玷污。那些颜色被稀释，涂满了腐朽……可他心中仍有一团鲜红的火焰。这团即将熄灭的火焰……可以再次熊熊燃烧。”

languages.text: 「技術司祭の色は垢で汚れています。色は薄い。腐敗に塗れていて…ですがまだ、心には鮮紅の燃え殻が残っています。この消えかけた炎は…再び燃え上がることもあるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest's colours are stained with grime. They are diluted. Painted over with rot... And yet his heart still holds a cinder of bright red. This dying flame... can be ignited anew."

traits.locale_text: 「技術司祭の色は垢で汚れています。色は薄い。腐敗に塗れ…しかし、まだ彼の心には鮮紅の燃え殻が残っています。この消えかけた炎は…再び燃え上がることもあるでしょう」

languages.text: «Los colores del tecnosacerdote están salpicados de mugre. Se han diluido, pintado sobre putrefacción... Y aun así en su corazón todavía arden cenizas de un rojo intenso. La llama que se apaga... puede avivarse de nuevo».
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest's colours are stained with grime. They are diluted. Painted over with rot... And yet his heart still holds a cinder of bright red. This dying flame... can be ignited anew."

traits.locale_text: «Los colores del tecnosacerdote están salpicados de mugre. Se han diluido, pintado sobre putrefacción... Y aun así en su corazón todavía arden cenizas de un rojo intenso. La llama que se apaga... puede avivarse de nuevo».

languages.text: "Tekno Rahip'in renkleri kire pasa bulanmış, seyrelmişler. Üzerlerine âdeta çürümüşlük sinmiş. Yine de rahibin kalbinden, kor gibi parlayan bir kırmızı yayılıyor. Sönmeye yüz tutmuş bu alev... Tekrar canlanabilir."
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priest's colours are stained with grime. They are diluted. Painted over with rot... And yet his heart still holds a cinder of bright red. This dying flame... can be ignited anew."

traits.locale_text: "Tekno Rahip'in renkleri kire pasa bulanmış. Tüm ihtişamlarını kaybetmişler. Üzerlerine âdeta çürümüşlük sinmiş. Buna rağmen rahibin kalbinden, parıl parıl parlayan, kor gibi bir kızıllık yayılıyor. Sönmeye yüz tutmuş bu alev... Tekrar canlanabilir."
